name: LoadDacPac
description: Deploys an SSDT DacPac against an on-premise SQL database
author: Total ALM

inputs.name: sqlVersion
inputs.label: SQL Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: The version of SQL Server to execute against.

inputs.name: dacpacfilepath
inputs.label: DacPac File Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The file path of the DacPac

inputs.name: useconnectionstring
inputs.label: Use Connection String
inputs.helpMarkDown: Whether you want to provide a connection string or not for this connection.

inputs.name: connectionstring
inputs.label: Connection String
inputs.helpMarkDown: The connection string that should be leveraged for publishing the dacpac.

inputs.name: sqlserver
inputs.label: Server Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the server to publish to.

inputs.name: databasename
inputs.label: Database Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the database to publish to.

inputs.name: windowsAuth
inputs.label: Windows Authentication
inputs.helpMarkDown: Whether or not to use windows authentication

inputs.name: userid
inputs.label: UserName
inputs.helpMarkDown: Username to log into the database with

inputs.name: password
inputs.label: Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: Password to log into the database with.

inputs.name: blockdataloss
inputs.label: Block Data Loss
inputs.helpMarkDown: Do you want to block data loss when publishing this dacpac.

inputs.name: allowincompatableplatform
inputs.label: Allow Incompatiable platform
inputs.helpMarkDown: Whether or not you want to prevent publishing if the dacpac and server don't have the same platform.

inputs.name: ignorefileandlogpaths
inputs.label: Ignore File and Log Paths
inputs.helpMarkDown: Whether or not to ignore the file and log paths when publishing.

inputs.name: includecompositeobjects
inputs.label: Include Composite Objects
inputs.helpMarkDown: Whether or not to include composite objects

inputs.name: dacpacdlloverride
inputs.label: Location of DacPac DLL in SQL Server
inputs.helpMarkDown: Whether or not to include composite objects
